item.title: The javascript transpile dialectic part 3
item.description: Objective Simple demo code for transpiling to Javascript. Review the setup and configuration for different transpiler engines. Target Audience Developers new to modern javascript frameworks and tooling Source Documents react babel webpack React Hot Module Replacement purecss Result See the Demo app for react The demo code has a number of setup options see see top level readme for general instructions. The transpile operation is driven via webpack and the dev server.
